name: Cheat Via Twitch
description:
Thanks for playing!

Synæsthesia - Game Designer

Stormhound - Game Developer

BayFick - 3D Artist

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump & Double Jump

MOUSE1 - Fire

R - Reload

For twitch user's you can type 1 , 2 , 3 for vote.

https://twitchapps.com/tmi/ For creating a OAuth. (Player's only)

1 - 5 for cheat. (Player's only)

NPC Animasyonları(Geri kalanları bize ait.) ve bazı SFX'ler hariç her şey bize aittir.
